message: i'd be interested in starting a study group if there are enough motivated people in the NY area. anybody?
A friend of mine showed me "The Micros" and the first thing he said after it was: "I bet he knows Dramatica. I mean, there's the Emotion character *right there*."
If that sounds like a slam, it's not. We were in the middle of talking about Dramatica, so it was on our minds.
Not a slam at all. Learning Dramatica has helped me a lot with the storytelling :)
I was hoping to get there - interviewed for a job in Manhattan a number of weeks ago, alas... I'm not "there".
I feel like I missed something here - after @krantz first post I have Mike saying "A friend of mine..." Is that what everyone else is seeing?
What you're missing is the conversation I had about  @krantz in a coffee shop a couple of months ago.
